semantic_description: All ADO.NET / Entity Framework database spans generated during stored-procedure executions in the CLM web service.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the stored procedure name parsed from DbCommand.CommandText (e.g., 'usp_GetContracts')

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the database name obtained from DbConnection.Database
